name: The White Owl
storyline: Based on personal experience, dreams, witness accounts, and stories entrenched in the history and lore associated with the Alien Abduction phenomenon, this short title hopes to put you in the same frame of mind as those who believe themselves to be living through the trauma of being observed by something extraterrestrial.
summary: The White Owl is a short atmospheric horror experience.
